descriptionlist.description: This is a simple theme that features teal colors with a black background. It also includes recolored notification badges. Designed with OLED displays in mind. The HTML color of the base teal is #00E2E6. If you find any bugs, want to submit feedback, or want to request that an icon be added, use any of the contact links at the bottom of the page to contact me and I'll do my best to help out!
